name: Chimes Child

attributes.attribute: born after Friday midnight but before dawn on Saturday
believed to have the Second Sight

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: British folklore tradition depicts Chimes Child as a figure who had the ability to see beyond ordinary perception and a power to cure illnesses. According to the legend in rural Somerset, any child who was born between midnight on a Friday and dawn on Saturday was believed to be gifted with the Second Sight and considered to possess the potential of being a skilled healer.
